___assertion.description: Description of what this testcase asserts

___skip.description:
Flag to skip testcase.
Should be a description of the reason for skipping.

$eref.description:
Data expected in a testcase.
Each key refers to a port, and the value is a description of the expected message on that port.
There can be one expectation (check) on each message, or an array of them.

___expect.description:
Expected data on fixture output ports.
Can either be an object, or a sequence of such objects.

___timeout.description: Timeout (in milliseconds). Overrides that set in the suite

___inputs.description: The inputs send to the fixture input ports, or a sequence of such inputs
